product_name: Leki Micro Vario Ti Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Easy to stow and quick to deploy when the trail gets technical, the Leki Micro Vario Ti Trekking Poles have a light and versatile folding design that's ideal for day hikers and trail runners. Innovative folding system with a concealed, Kevlar-reinforced tensioning rope offers easy setup and breakdown and compact stowing. Speed Lock locking mechanism lets you quickly lengthen poles from 43.3 to 51.2 in. with the flick of a lever. Push-button release mechanism lets you assemble and collapse the Leki Micro Vario Ti trekking poles with ease. Aergon foam edgeless grips sit in your hands comfortably; non-slip mid grip extends down the pole shaft to allow various gripping heights. Lightweight yet strong aluminum shafts stand up to everyday use on the trail. The Leki Micro Vario Ti Trekking Poles come with a red mesh carry bag.
short_description: Easy to stow and quick to deploy when the trail gets technical, the Leki Micro Vario Ti Trekking Poles have a light and versatile folding design that's ideal for day hikers and trail runners.
